env HOME=$WORK/home

benchinit -benchtime=10x cmd/go
stdout '^BenchmarkCmdGo'
! stdout '0 B/op\s*0 allocs/op' # does alloc
! stderr .

! benchinit cmd/go cmd/compile
! stdout .
stderr 'one main package at a time'

benchinit -benchtime=10x internal/buildcfg
stdout '^BenchmarkInternalBuildcfg'
! stdout '0 B/op\s*0 allocs/op' # does alloc
! stderr .
-- go.mod --
module test.tld/foo
